divs: Sighting DetailsLets start off by saying I am not nuts--I came home pulled up into my driveway walked to the backdoor of my home..witch face north and while unlocking my door I looked directly behind me and of in the distance I noticed a very bold light that did not perform normal flying motions.A solid light light would go west for 5 seconds and then would sharply almost instantly go east,very crazy also did this a couple of times sometimes would do a impossible curve turn that can not be done that fast no way.like I said I am not nuts and even if no body believes me that is fine cause I was there ans seen something I will never forget and that is all I need. thank you
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in New Castle
There were no other sightings in New Castle on or around September 22nd 2009
